statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')"; model_name="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')"; short_dir="$(echo "$current_dir" | sed "s|^$HOME|~|")"; if git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch="$(git -C "$current_dir" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null)"; if git -C "$current_dir" diff --quiet && git -C "$current_dir" diff --cached --quiet; then git_status="($branch)"; else git_status="($branch âœ—)"; fi; printf "\033[2m\033[1;32m$(whoami)@$(hostname -s)\033[0m\033[2m:\033[1;34m%s\033[0m \033[1;33m%s\033[0m \033[2m[%s]\033[0m" "$short_dir" "$git_status" "$model_name"; else printf "\033[2m\033[1;32m$(whoami)@$(hostname -s)\033[0m\033[2m:\033[1;34m%s\033[0m \033[2m[%s]\033[0m" "$short_dir" "$model_name"; fi
